net.doo.snap.dcscanner

Class DCScannerFrameHandler

  • net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler

  • public class DCScannerFrameHandler

    Performs Disability Certificates data detection on camera preview frames. Outputs results via interface DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler (net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler$addResultHandler(net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler)).

    Preview frame considered intercepted if at least one interface DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler returns true from io.scanbot.sdk.camera.BaseResultHandler$handle(io.scanbot.sdk.camera.FrameHandlerResult)

    See Also:
    interface DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler, net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler$addResultHandler(net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler), interface DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler, io.scanbot.sdk.camera.BaseResultHandler$handle(io.scanbot.sdk.camera.FrameHandlerResult), interface PreviewBuffer

    • Constructor Detail

      • DCScannerFrameHandler

        public DCScannerFrameHandler(android.content.Context context,
                             DCScanner dcScanner)

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public static DCScannerFrameHandler attach(ScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                           DCScanner dcScanner)

        Convenience method for creating new class DCScannerFrameHandler and adding it as interface PreviewBuffer.FrameHandler to given camera view.

        Parameters:
        cameraView - camera view to which new DC data detector will be attached
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@2d7b179f: new class DCScannerFrameHandler
        See Also:
        class DCScannerFrameHandler, interface PreviewBuffer.FrameHandler

      • handleFrame

        public boolean handleFrame(net.doo.snap.camera.PreviewBuffer.FrameHandler.Frame previewFrame)

      • addResultHandler

        public void addResultHandler(net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler handler)

        Registers result handler which will be notified about DC data detection results.

        Results are coming on the worker thread. Don't forget to move execution to main thread before updating UI.

        Parameters:
        handler - handler to register. Must not be null. If handler was already registered, nothing happens.

      • removeResultHandler

        public void removeResultHandler(net.doo.snap.dcscanner.DCScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler handler)

        Unregisters handler.

        Parameters:
        handler - handler to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothing happens.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@63a310a8: true if DC data detection is enabled. false if DC data detection is disabled, i.e. incoming frames are skipped.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable DC data detection. false to disable DC data detection.
